definitions.title: vb. 1.
definitions.body: deal fully or adequately with, deal out to.

ripen (As. gamâlu, deal with, benefit, e.g. VR 35:19; NH [[גׇּמַל]], Aram. [[גְּמַל]]; v. Palm. n.pr. [[אגמלא]] Vog:No. 124, Nab. n. pr. f. [[גמלת]] Vog.:Nab. sub No. 7; perh. orig. complete, accomplish, cogn. [[גמר]];—Ar. jamala is collect, jamula be beautiful, goodly)—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: deal out to, do to, c. 2 acc. [[גְּמָלַתְהוּ טוֹב וְלאׁ רָע]] she doeth him good and not evil Pr 31:12; [[כִּי אַתָּה גְּמַלְתַּנִי הַטּוֹבָה]] [[וַאֲנִי גְּמַלְתִּיךָ הָֽרָעָה]] for thou hast done unto me the good but I have done unto thee the evil 1Sa 24:18; do evil [[רע]]([[ה]]) unto Ge 50:15, Ge 50:17, Pr 3:30; c. [[לְ]] pers. Is 3:9; do good unto, 2 acc. Is 63:7, Is 63:7; cf. also [[גּׁמֵל נַפְשׁוֹ אִישׁ חֶסֶד]] Pr 11:17.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with [[עַל]] pers. deal bountifully with Ps 13:6, Ps 116:7, Ps 119:17, Ps 142:7; c. acc. pers. reward 2Sa 22:21 (= Ps 18:21), perh. also [[לָמָּה יִגְמְלֵנִי הַגְּמוּלָה הַזּאׁת]] why should he reward me with this reward? 2Sa 19:37.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: recompense, repay, requite, in a bad sense, with 2 acc. Ps 7:5; with [[לְ]] pers. De 32:6, Ps 137:8; with [[עַל]] pers. 2Ch 20:11, Ps 103:10, Joe 4:4.
wean a child (complete his nursing) 1Sa 1:23, 1Sa 1:23, 1Sa 1:24, 1Ki 11:20, Ho 1:8; [[גׇּמוּל]] weaned child Ps 131:2, Ps 131:2, Is 11:8; [[גְּמוּלֵי מֵחָלָב]] weaned from milk Is 28:9.
trans. ripen, bear ripe (almonds) Nu 17:23; intrans. become ripe (grapes) Is 18:5.
